ðŸ“– Summary: Enchat is a terminal-based chat application that provides end-to-end encrypted communication with a focus on privacy and security. It offers features like secure room creation, file sharing, perfect forward secrecy, Tor support, and a zero-knowledge architecture, ensuring that messages are protected from eavesdropping and data harvesting.
